Technique: PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; ENGRAVED; RELIEF
Name: Terracotta of Harpocrates on horseback
Description: Figurine of Harpocrates on horseback. The god appears with his head and body in frontal view, reins in his left hand and the index finger of the right hand at the lips. He is wearing the double crown and the side lock. The horse is shown at an amble. The whole is mounted on a pedestal.
